import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Grid, Paper, Typography, Button } from "@material-ui/core"; import Header from "../components/Header"; const Home = () => { const [pageNav, setPageNav] = useState({ page: "SignIn" }) const [userAuth, setUserAuth] = useState({ authed: false }) const submitLogin = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault(); setPageNav({ page: "Authed" }) setUserAuth({ authed: true }) } switch (pageNav.page) { case "SignUp": return (
Sign Up!
Name Email Password Confirm Password
) case "Authed": return (
Authed
) default: return (
Log In
Email Password
) } } export default Home;
